about.content: My career is characterized by a constant pursuit of innovation and improvement through education. items.title: Front Desk Manager

Develop and implement B2B/B2C digital acquisition strategies, leveraging language models (LLM) to improve effectiveness.
Manage resolution of customer incidents and complaints (in-person/remote), strengthening relationships and loyalty.
Contribute to improving the shopping experience by optimizing product presentation and sales floor functionality.
